<!-- Clix Agent Skills llms.txt -->

# Clix Agent Skills

This file contains a comprehensive index of all Clix Agent Skills files.
Each entry includes the file path, type, and description for semantic search.

---

## clix-api-triggered-campaigns

- [clix-api-triggered-campaigns](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/skills/refs/heads/main/skills/api-triggered-campaigns/SKILL.md): Main skill documentation

- [Debugging (Reference)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/skills/refs/heads/main/skills/api-triggered-campaigns/references/debugging.md): Reference documentation for api-triggered-campaigns skill
